00023 using namespace SilentEyeFramework;

00030 void showMessage(QString msg, Logger& logger)
00031 {
00032     logger.warning(msg);
00033     QMessageBox mb("SilentEye Warning",
00034                    msg, QMessageBox::Warning, 0, 0, 0);
00035     mb.exec();
00036 }

00043 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00044 {
00045     QApplication app(argc, argv);
00046 
00047     Controller::appPath = qApp->applicationDirPath()+"/";
00048     Controller::config = Config(Controller::appPath, "silenteye");
00049     
00050     Logger::setFileName(Controller::appPath + "silenteye.log");
00051     Logger::setLevel(Controller::config.get("loglevel"));
00052     
00053     ModuleManager::load();
00054 
00055     if (app.argc() <= 1)
00056     {
00057         /* Normal mode */
00058         if( !Controller::config.contains("output") || Controller::config.get("output").trimmed() == "")
00059             // default output is the user home
00060             Controller::config.set("output", QDir::homePath()+"/");
00061 
00062         MainWindow mainWin;
00063         mainWin.show();
00064         return app.exec();
00065     }
00066     else
00067     {
00068         /* Quick mode */
00069         Logger logger("main");
00070         for (int i = 0; i < app.argc(); i++)
00071             logger.debug("Parameter " + QString::number(i) + ": " + QString(app.argv()[i]));
00072 
00073         if(app.argc() != 3) {
00074             showMessage("Usage: " + QString(app.argv()[0]) 
00075                         + " [action] [file_path]\n action: encode/decode\n "
00076                         + "file_path: absolute path to image", logger);
00077             return 1;
00078         }
00079 
00080         if( !Controller::config.contains("output") || Controller::config.get("output").trimmed() == "")
00081             // default output is the current directory
00082             Controller::config.set("output", QDir::currentPath());
00083 
00084         QString action(app.argv()[1]);
00085         QString filePath(app.argv()[2]);
00086 
00087         // Load image
00088         QPointer<Image> img = new Image(filePath);
00089         if(img->isNull())
00090         {
00091             showMessage("Cannot load '" + filePath 
00092                         + "'\n file: file not found or unsupported image type.", logger);
00093             return 2;
00094         }
00095 
00096         // create the specified dialog
00097         OptionDialog* dialog = NULL;
00098         if (action == "encode")
00099             dialog = new EncodeDialog();
00100         else if(action == "decode")
00101             dialog = new DecodeDialog();
00102         else {
00103             showMessage("Specified action not recognised: " + action, logger);
00104             return 3;
00105         }
00106 
00107         // setup dialog
00108         dialog->setImage(img);
00109 
00110         int return_code = dialog->exec();
00111         delete dialog;
00112         return return_code;
00113     }
00114 }
